name: gilek/yii2-gtreetable
description: Yii-GTreeTable is an extension of Yii Framework, which is wrapper for GTreeTable plug-in, on the other hand it provides functionality which allows to save the nodes states into database.

post-install-cmd: cd gilek/yii2-gtreetable && git submodule init && git submodule update
post-update-cmd: cd gilek/yii2-gtreetable && git submodule init && git submodule update
